fetch_crypto_pair_price.name: fetch_crypto_pair_price
fetch_crypto_pair_price.description: Fetch the current price of a pair (e.g. BTC/USDT)

first_coin.description: The currency to fetch the price for (e.g. 'BTC' in 'BTC/USDT')

second_coin.description: The currency to fetch the price in (e.g. 'USDT' in 'BTC/USDT')
